Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the exterior is covered with a burnished red-brown slip, only very faint traces of a black-painted text now survive.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393835) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393835)
